item.title: The Titular Gallery
item.description: Welcome to the art part of the art gallery of code art. Art.

item.title: Ramblings
item.description: I’m not a fan of social media. This is why you won’t find any personal links on this site: I don’t have any. I still wanna say things though, just not so publicly.

item.title: Would you believe this site was made in 2020?
item.description: Times have surely changed. I assure you, this site won’t look like that again.
